title: Bitcoin or MicroStrategy Stock? Analyst Says MSTR Trades at ‘Unjustifiable Premium’ Over BTC
description: The Kerrisdale investment firm says that the software company's stock will take a hit because its price is now unjustified.

title: TRON DAO reveals exciting updates to sponsor and judge list for HackaTRON Season 6
description: HackaTRON Season 6 unveils new sponsors, partners, and judges for a hackathon with a massive prize pool of $650K in TRX and energy.

title: Restaking protocol Prisma Finance hit with $12 million exploit
description: Prisma Finance was exploited for over $11 million on Mar.

title: US and UK jointly sanction online media channel Gaza Now for fundraising for Hamas
description: Gaza Now, an online media channel supporting Hamas, and its owner, Mustafa Ayash, have been sanctioned jointly by the United States and the United Kingdom for their involvement in fundraising activities for the group. This move comes after the Oct 7 attack in Israel and emphasizes a unified approach in the attempt to restrict funding […]

title: CBN Governor clarifies his stance on crypto regulation
description: The Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) has been in the news over the developments concerning the regulation of cryptocurrencies in the country. In a recent turn of events, Yemi Cardoso, the governor of the Central Bank noted that crypto regulation in the country is under the jurisdiction of the Securities and Exchange Commission of Nigeria […]
